InReac: ^Knight: Hanzo! There you are. Have you gathered any useful information?
^Ninja: That scientist has some pretty nasty stuff waiting in the town
^Ninja: We should continue together from now on
^Mage: Hmmm, I see. So he managed to build it...
^Mage: I have the feeling that you are going to see it very soon
^Mage: Let's reach him as soon as possible
^Ninja: The town is filled with monsters, we should be careful
